import React, { Component } from 'react' import { DatePicker, InputNumber } from 'antd'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css' import './index.css' export default class Input extends Component { state = { count1:0, count2:0, count3:0, count4:0, } stockpile = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const {value} = this.inputNumber const {count1} = this.state const {count2} = this.state const {count3} = this.state const {count4} = this.state this.setState({count:count1 + value*1}) this.setState({count:count2 + value*1}) this.setState({count:count3 + value*1}) this.setState({count:count4 + value*1}) } render() { const {count1, count2, count3, count4} = this.state return (
选择某一天的注射点存储疫苗： this.input =c}/>

请输入各注射点想要储存的疫苗量：

注射点1： this.inputNumber = c}/> 已存：{count1}
注射点2： this.inputNumber = c}/> 已存：{count2}
注射点3： this.inputNumber = c}/> 已存：{count3}
注射点4： this.inputNumber = c}/> 已存：{count4}
这天总共存储了{count1+count2+count3+count4}支疫苗
) } }
